concept.title: Goodbye!
concept.shortdesc: We really hoped you enjoyed your stay.

conbody.p: Shanks Hall is the best of the best here at Virginia Tech. We sincerely hope that your stay was satisfying, and that this booklet was easy to follow.
There is much to do here, from group activities to hosting meetings, and we hope you come back soon to try them out!
If you have any further comments, questions, or concerns, please feel free to contact us through the Airclassroom website.
